Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.mm-rulebook.Item.u5uPp2qYPln7aoOz]{Psiblade Proficiency} or @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.aa-rulebook.Item.M1Cbm2LJqmpzRAFq]{Plasma Blade Proficiency}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.mm-rulebook.Item.jViibXrHmQKko0gM]{Basic Defensive Form}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.mm-rulebook.Item.IqlAGgpvfpZnCc2W]{Reaction Form Focus}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.mm-rulebook.Item.WR1aUMPFdye0K53C]{Reaction Form Expertise}

Benefits

When using a psiblade or plasblade, the character can change their reaction to either the Predict reaction or the Parry reaction, after the first attack that triggers their reaction, up to five times per round. If they choose to do this, they immediately lose the previous bonus from the previous reaction and they immediately reroll the saving throw and receive the new bonus.
system.summary: Change reaction five times per round
